mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.REPEAT_COUNT, b.REPEAT_INTERVAL, b.TIMES_TRIGGERED FROM QRTZ_TRIGGERS a LEFT JOIN QRTZ_SIMPLE_TRIGGERS b ON (a.SCHED_NAME=b.SCHED_NAME AND a.TRIGGER_GROUP=b.TRIGGER_GROUP AND a.TRIGGER_NAME=b.TRIGGER_NAME) WHERE b.SCHED_NAME IS NOT NULL AND a.SCHED_NAME = #{schedName} AND a.JOB_NAME = #{jobName} AND a.JOB_GROUP = #{jobGroup}
SELECT * FROM QRTZ_TRIGGERS WHERE SCHED_NAME = #{schedName} AND TRIGGER_NAME = #{jobName} AND TRIGGER_GROUP = #{jobGroup}
